resources:
CESTMOI
23 years old Computer Science student christysimarmata7@gmail.com 11020806 My name is Christy Gunawan Simarmata, born in Sidikalang on 15th December 1998. Im the youngest out all of my siblings. I study computer science at Universitas Komputer Indonesia, currently in 6th semester. I dont think coding is my passion, but one gotta do what one gotta do to survive.
The sole purpoes of creating this apps is as a requirement to pass the mid-semester exam. Whole app created in Java Language in Android Studio version 4.0.32"
//Headings Knows Me Better My Interests n Dream One Day in My Life Get to Know My Friends
//Description Knows basic information about the creator of this app You will get to see all the interests and dream that i have, plus whether i achieve it or not Follow me as i do my daily activities, and see how i spend most of my days You will also get to see the people surround me, which is my friends.
Hello blank fragment
Bangun Pagi
Mandi dan Sarapan
Kuliah Pagi
Makan Siang
Kuliah Siang
Lari Sore
Mandi dan Makan Malam
Hiburan
Tidur
Bangun pagi supaya rejeki nya gak dipatok ayam.
Mandi kalau rajin, kalau sarapan sih wajib
Kuliah pagi atau belajar mandiri
Makan siang depan laptop sambil nonton Youtube
Lanjut kuliah atau belajar mandiri
Olahraga sedikit, bisa jogging atau stretching
Mandi sore abis itu baru makan malam.
Main keluar, main game atau nonton film
Goodnight and have a nice dream!
